title: The Pilgrims
creator_credit: John Barnes and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: A recreation of the events leading to the settlement of the first English colony in New England. Shows the hardships of the first winter on Cape Cod, the problems of government as solved by the Mayflower Compact, the relationship between the settlers and the native Americans, and the celebration of the first Thanksgiving.
